definition: an order that after a specific time certain activities, as being outside on the streets, are prohibited
details:
noun
- an order that after a specific time certain activities, as being outside on the streets, are prohibited
= example: an order that after a specific time certain activities, as being outside on the streets, are prohibited
- a signal (usually a bell) announcing the start of curfew restrictions
- the time that the curfew signal is sounded
